name: Dog in the dungeon
description:
The dog is in the dungeon, and as his owner, so you are!

Hold the mouse button to throw daggers.

Try to get the highest score by getting level ups from walking onto experience points.

Defend your Dog from nasty Crabs that try to get him.

If your Dog gets hit by a fireball, it loses 1/3 of It's health.

If It gets hit by a Crab, You lose.
